title: how to change my name
body: so i haven't played for like a long time, but when i came back, i have this name i never used, how do i change it?{{champion:32}}

replies.body: You can purchase a Summoner Name change through the client shop! It should be under the options where you would do a region transfer.
You can change your name via the shop for 13900 IP or 1300 RP.
